GeneDef.label: hivemind drone
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are part of the hivemind, but do not contribute any special effects to it.

GeneDef.label: shared skills
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can synchronize some of the experience accumulated by drones of the hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: From time to time, it synchronizes the <color=#8a8ae6>skills</color>.
Only the <color=#8a8ae6>level</color> is synchronized, experience is not affected.
Synchronizes to the <color=#8a8ae6>higher</color> value.

GeneDef.label: shared thoughts
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can share the thoughts of hivemind drones, thus improving or worsening the overall mood of the entire hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: From time to time, <color=#8a8ae6>shifts the mood</color> of all hivemind pawns, relative to the <color=#8a8ae6>total mood (* psy-sens% / 2)</color> of all <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawns.
<color=#8a8ae6>Low psy-sensitivity</color> will result in loss of nutrients.

li.label: hivemind
li.description: I hear the thoughts of other hivemind drones, their experiences, grief and joy.

GeneDef.label: shared needs
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special influence on the hivemind, they are able to synchronize some of the needs of its drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: From time to time, it synchronizes <color=#8a8ae6>needs</color>.
Only <color=#8a8ae6>recreation, comfort, outdoors, indoors, beauty</color> are synchronized.
Synchronizes to the <color=#8a8ae6>higher</color> value.

GeneDef.label: shared nutrients
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that can transfer nutrients between hivemind drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Synchronizes <color=#8a8ae6>food needs</color> between <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> drones.
Synchronization occurs to the <color=#8a8ae6>average total</color> value.
<color=#f46d6b>Low psy-sensitivity will result in loss of nutrients.</color>

GeneDef.label: hivemind opinion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special psychic influence on the hivemind, significantly improving their relationships with its drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day the hivemind pawns gets an <color=#8a8ae6>opinion offset</color> lasting about a day.
Affects the hive's opinion with the <color=#8a8ae6>carrier</color> and the <color=#8a8ae6>carrier's opinion with the hive</color>, without affecting the opinion between other pawns of the hive.

GeneDef.label: hivemind mood
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special organ that secretes the hormone of happiness relative to the size of hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day gives a temporary boost to the <color=#8a8ae6>mood</color>, which depends on the <color=#8a8ae6>number</color> of hivemind pawns.

li.label: hivemind size
li.description: Our hive is growing, it makes us stronger.

GeneDef.label: sync node
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a special psychic organ used to synchronize the hive's drones. Thanks to this organ, the hive will always be able to better integrate new drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day it <color=#8a8ae6>synchronizes the hivemind</color> and integrates new drones from among <color=#8a8ae6>former prisoners or wanderers</color>.
Displays the number of pawns in the <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> in <color=#8a8ae6>stats</color>.

GeneDef.label: ideo sync
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can change the ideological views of the hivemind at their own discretion.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Allows to change the <color=#8a8ae6>ideology</color> of all <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawns to any desired one.
Cooldown: 1 day.

GeneDef.label: hivemind regeneration
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that quickly regenerate damaged tissue. The effectiveness depends on the size of the hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Healing: 4 hp/day * <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawns.

GeneDef.label: hivemind chain
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene bind the hivemind with a strong psychic bond, their death will kill the entire hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: <color=#8a8ae6>Death kills</color> all <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawns.

GeneDef.label: traits copy
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can receive traits from other hivemind drones.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Copies the <color=#8a8ae6>traits</color> of all <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawns from time to time.
<color=#8a8ae6>Traits</color> are copied as is, <color=#8a8ae6>including conflicting</color> ones that overlap.
<color=#8a8ae6>Traits</color> that have 0 commonality are ignored.

GeneDef.label: hivemind telepathy
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can communicate telepathically with other drones of the hivemind.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Carrier can enter into social <color=#8a8ae6>interaction</color> with any <color=#8a8ae6>hivemind</color> pawn on the map, at any distance.
